name: Endless Dungeon (itch) (UNICODE_)
description:
Go through a randomly generated dungeon, fight monsters, and collect the best equipment to get through as much as possible!

There are MORE than 150 unique rooms available to walk through, all of which are randomly generated.

Collect loot from chests of varying rarity, find the best equipment to pass the maximum number of rooms.

Fight against MORE than 20 types of monsters, collect rewards, and buy more powerful items, of which there are MORE than 45 in the game.
